conversation.content: Hello everyone, welcome to your mediation. My name is ___. I am glad you are here to mediate and I look forward to helping you work through your conflict today. What are your names?

Thanks! Really quickly, I'd like to tell you about mediation. Mediation is a way to resolve your dispute in a peaceful and collaborative manner. My role as a mediator is to be ___ and actively listen. As mediator, I will not take sides and will listen fully to each point of view.
Your role will be to be patient, flexible, and to listen to one another. You should be respectful and not ___ one another. Also, listen and think about the other person’s point of view.
